title: Mediterranean Grilled Vegetables
content: Grill a variety of vegetables such as zucchini, bell peppers, eggplant, and cherry tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, and sprinkle with fresh herbs like oregano and thyme.

title: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
content: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Mix with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, and spices. Stuff the mixture into halved bell peppers and bake until tender.

title: Green Smoothie Bowl
content: Blend spinach, kale, banana, pineapple, and coconut water until smooth. Pour into a bowl and top with sliced fruits, nuts, and seeds for added texture and nutrients.

title: Vegetable Curry with Chickpeas
content: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in a pot. Add curry powder, turmeric, and cumin. Stir in chopped vegetables, chickpeas, and coconut milk. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Serve over rice.

title: Mango Avocado Salad
content: Combine diced mango, avocado, cucumber, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl. Dress with lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Toss gently and serve as a refreshing side dish.

title: Tofu Stir-Fry
content: Marinate tofu in soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic. Stir-fry with colorful vegetables like bell peppers, broccoli, and snap peas. Serve over brown rice or noodles.

title: Vegetarian Chili
content: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers in a pot. Add kidney beans, black beans, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, and chili powder. Simmer until flavors meld. Serve with toppings like avocado and cilantro.

title: Spinach and Mushroom Quesadillas
content: Sauté sliced mushrooms and spinach until wilted. Place on a tortilla with shredded cheese. Fold in half and cook in a skillet until golden and crispy. Serve with salsa and guacamole.

title: Falafel Wrap
content: Stuff whole-wheat wraps with homemade or store-bought falafel balls, sliced cucumbers, tomatoes, lettuce, and tahini sauce. Roll up and enjoy a delicious and filling wrap.

title: Ratatouille
content: Layer thinly sliced vegetables like tomatoes, zucchini, eggplant, and bell peppers in a baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with herbs, and bake until vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
